thread.title: We’re Not Going to Hear a Speech Like This Again: Anderson Cooper on Obama’s Farewell Speech
thread.title_full: We’re Not Going to Hear a Speech Like This Again: Anderson Cooper on Obama’s Farewell Speech

author: Justin Baragona
title: We’re Not Going to Hear a Speech Like This Again: Anderson Cooper on Obama’s Farewell Speech
text:
We’re Not Going to Hear a Speech Like This Again: Anderson Cooper on Obama’s Farewell Speech   10:28   Video 
Immediately after President Barack Obama’s farewell address in Chicago, CNN’s Anderson Cooper compared the speaking styles of the outgoing and incoming presidents. 
“And thinking about the next president about to take office,” Cooper stated, referencing President-elect Donald Trump. “Their speaking styles couldn’t be any more different.” 
He continued, “We are not going to be hearing a speech like this from a sitting president for the next four to eight years.” 
Watch the clip above, via CNN. 
[image via screengrab]
